title: Chocolate Coconut Treats
directions: Blend coconut for half an hour or until a thick liquid.
Blend in cocoa until well mixed (a few seconds.) 3 Add nuts and raisins and blend until roughly chopped (A few seconds.)
4 Spoon into two 12 patty pan trays.
Turn out. (You may need to carefully hold tray on top of sink of hot water for a few seconds to loosen.)
